backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend with types and methods for contact messages, daily analytics (visitor counts and tool usage), and blog posts (add, filter by category, sort by date).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the creation of the Google AdSense/site verification static file at `frontend/public/f8073e773aa7cba5922a.txt`.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering tool pages, hooks, admin pages, blog pages, ad components, and contexts.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Root HTML shell that sets the page title, includes the Google AdSense script, and mounts the React app via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/public/f8073e773aa7cba5922a.txt: Static Google site verification file served at the website root containing the token `google-site-verification: f8073e773aa7cba5922a`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry that sets up TanStack Router with lazy-loaded routes for all tool, blog, legal, and admin pages, and includes an `AdSenseGuard` that disables AdSense on admin routes.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdBanner.tsx: Reusable ad banner placeholder component that renders a styled div with configurable width, height, and label for Google AdSense integration.
frontend/src/components/ads/PopupAd.tsx: Popup ad component that appears after a 5-second delay with a dismissible overlay, containing a 300×250 AdSense placeholder.
frontend/src/components/ads/StickyBottom: Fixed bottom-of-screen ad bar with a 728×60 AdSense placeholder and a close button to dismiss it.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Site footer with brand info, popular tool links, legal/company links, resource links, hashtags, and a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky site header with logo, desktop nav links, and a collapsible mobile menu, plus a leaderboard AdBanner above the nav.
frontend/src/components/seo/Breadcrumb.t: Renders an accessible breadcrumb trail from a list of items, prepending a Home link with a chevron separator.
frontend/src/components/seo/FAQSection.t: Displays a list of FAQ items in a collapsible accordion UI under a configurable section heading.
frontend/src/components/seo/SEOHead.tsx: Imperatively sets document title, meta tags (description, OG, Twitter), canonical link, and JSON-LD schema scripts via useEffect.
frontend/src/components/tools/ImageToolT: Page layout template for image tools that wires up SEO, breadcrumbs, ad banners, FAQ, and related tools around the tool's child UI.
frontend/src/components/tools/MultiFileU: Drag-and-drop upload zone supporting multiple file selection with a file list display and per-file removal, capped at a configurable max.
frontend/src/components/tools/PdfToolTem: Page layout template for PDF tools, identical in structure to ImageToolTemplate but categorizes the schema as a BusinessApplication.
frontend/src/components/tools/RelatedToo: Renders a grid of linked cards for related tools, each showing the tool's icon, name, and description.
frontend/src/components/tools/ToolUpload: Single-file drag-and-drop upload zone with click-to-browse support, showing different icons for image vs. PDF accept types.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides a React authentication context with login, logout, and credential/password change functionality, storing session state and credentials in sessionStorage with hardcoded defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
Custom hook that removes a background color from an image using canvas pixel manipulation, with configurable color and tolerance, returning a blob URL of the result.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Custom hook managing a contact form with validation, submission via the ICP backend actor's addContactMessage method, and success/error state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageCompression.t: Custom hook that compresses an image file using canvas and returns a blob URL with size info; also exports a loadImage utility function.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageConversion.ts: Custom hook that converts an image file to a specified format (JPEG, PNG, or WebP) using canvas, returning a blob URL and file size.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageCrop.ts: Custom hook that crops an image file to a specified area using canvas, returning a blob URL with the cropped dimensions.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageMetadata.ts: Custom hook that extracts metadata from an image file including dimensions, aspect ratio, file type, size, and last modified date.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageResize.ts: Custom hook that resizes an image file to specified dimensions using canvas, with optional aspect ratio preservation, returning a blob URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageRotation.ts: Custom hook that rotates and/or flips an image file by arbitrary degrees using canvas transforms, returning a blob URL of the result.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login status, identity persistence, and delegation validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useJpgToPdf.ts: Custom React hook that converts one or more JPG image files into a PDF by manually constructing a PDF binary with embedded JPEG XObjects, returning a blob URL and file size.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTracking.ts: Custom React hook that fires an analytics update to the backend actor whenever the component mounts, recording the current date and tool name.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfCompression.ts: Custom React hook stub for PDF compression that currently passes the original file through unchanged, as pdf-lib is not available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfLock.ts: Custom React hook stub for password-locking a PDF that passes the file through unchanged since encryption support requires pdf-lib.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfMerge.ts: Custom React hook for merging multiple PDFs that currently returns only the first file as a placeholder, since real merging requires pdf-lib.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfPageNumbers.ts: Custom React hook stub for adding page numbers to a PDF that passes the file through unchanged due to missing pdf-lib dependency.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfSplit.ts: Custom React hook stub for splitting a PDF by page ranges that returns the original file unchanged, as splitting requires pdf-lib.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfToJpg.ts: Custom React hook that converts each page of a PDF to a JPEG image by dynamically loading PDF.js from a CDN and rendering pages to canvas elements.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfToWord.ts: Custom React hook that extracts text from a PDF using dynamically loaded PDF.js and returns it as a plain-text blob, one section per page.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfUnlock.ts: Custom React hook stub for unlocking a password-protected PDF that currently passes the file through unchanged without actual decryption.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfWatermark.ts: Custom React hook stub for adding a text watermark to a PDF that passes the file through unchanged due to missing pdf-lib dependency.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for analytics, blog posts, and contact messages, wrapping backend actor calls with useQuery and useMutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWordToPdf.ts: Custom React hook that converts plain text to a multi-page PDF by manually building a PDF 1.4 binary with Helvetica text streams, returning a blob URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for the dark theme color system, and provides utility classes for gradients, card hover effects, upload zones, and scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing ToolsHub Free's mission, features (speed, privacy, free access), story, and stats, with SEO metadata and page tracking.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard page showing analytics charts and stat cards, with tabs for settings including a ChangeUsernameCard form that updates admin credentials via AuthContext.
Admin login page with username/password form that authenticates via AuthContext and redirects to the dashboard on success, showing an error message on failure.
frontend/src/pages/BlogArticlePage.tsx: Dynamic blog article page that looks up a post by slug, renders its markdown-like content with a custom parser, displays related tools, and includes structured schema markup and ad banners.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Blog listing page that displays all seed blog posts in a card grid with category tab filtering, SEO metadata, schema markup, and an ad banner.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with name, email, and message fields powered by a useContactForm hook, showing a success state on submission and SEO/page tracking setup.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Static Disclaimer page outlining tool accuracy limitations, liability, and indemnification terms, with SEO metadata and page tracking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main landing page displaying a hero section, search input, and tabbed grid of image/PDF tools with inline ad banners inserted every 5 items. Includes structured WebSite schema and page tracking.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Static privacy policy page explaining data collection, cookie usage, third-party services (AdSense, Analytics), and client-side file processing. Includes SEO metadata and page tracking.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Static terms and conditions page covering acceptable use, intellectual property, disclaimers, and liability limitations. Includes SEO metadata and page tracking.
frontend/src/pages/tools/BackgroundRemov: Tool page for removing image backgrounds using a color picker and tolerance slider, displaying before/after previews and a download button for the processed PNG.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ImageCompressor: Page component for compressing images with an adjustable quality slider, displaying original vs. compressed size stats and a download link for the result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ImageCropperPag: Page component for cropping images by specifying X, Y, width, and height pixel values, then downloading the cropped output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ImageMetadataVi: Page component that extracts and displays image metadata (file name, size, type, dimensions, aspect ratio, last modified) upon file upload.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ImageResizerPag: Page component for resizing images to specified pixel dimensions with an optional aspect-ratio lock, then downloading the resized result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ImageRotatorPag: Page component for rotating images by 90°, 180°, or 270° and flipping horizontally or vertically, with a live preview and download option.
frontend/src/pages/tools/ImageToWebpPage: Page component for converting images to WebP format with a configurable quality slider and a download link for the converted file.
frontend/src/pages/tools/JpgToPdfPage.ts: Page component for converting one or more image files (JPG, PNG, WebP) into a single PDF, with a multi-file upload zone and download link.
frontend/src/pages/tools/JpgToPngPage.ts: Page component for converting JPG/JPEG images to PNG format, allowing users to upload a file, preview it, trigger conversion via the useImageConversion hook, and download the result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfCompressorPa: Page component for compressing PDF files using the usePdfCompression hook, displaying original vs. compressed file sizes and providing a download link for the compressed output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfLockPage.tsx: Page component for password-protecting a PDF file using the usePdfLock hook, with a password input field (toggle visibility) and a download link for the locked PDF.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfMergePage.ts: Page component for merging multiple PDF files (minimum 2) into one using the usePdfMerge hook, with a multi-file upload zone and a download link for the merged result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfPageNumbersP: Page component for adding page numbers to a PDF using the usePdfPageNumbers hook, with configurable position and starting number options and a download link for the numbered PDF.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfSplitPage.ts: Page component for splitting a PDF into multiple files by user-defined page ranges using the usePdfSplit hook, listing each resulting split file with individual download links.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToJpgPage.ts: Page component for converting each page of a PDF to a JPG image using the usePdfToJpg hook, showing a progress bar during conversion and a grid of page previews with individual download links.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfToWordPage.t: React page for extracting text from a PDF file, displaying a preview of the extracted text, and downloading the result as a .txt file using the usePdfToWord hook.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfUnlockPage.t: React page that allows users to upload a password-protected PDF, enter its password, and download the unlocked version using the usePdfUnlock hook.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PdfWatermarkPag: React page for adding a customizable text watermark (text, opacity, font size, position) to a PDF file and downloading the result using the usePdfWatermark hook.
frontend/src/pages/tools/PngToJpgPage.ts: React page that converts an uploaded PNG image to JPG at a user-selected quality level and provides a download link using the useImageConversion hook.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WebpToJpgPage.t: React page that converts an uploaded WebP image to JPG at a user-selected quality level and provides a download link using the useImageConversion hook.
frontend/src/pages/tools/WordToPdfPage.t: React page that converts user-entered or pasted text into a downloadable PDF file using the useWordToPdf hook.
frontend/src/utils/seedBlogPosts.ts: Defines the SeedBlogPost interface and exports an array of seed blog post objects covering topics like image compression and PDF tools, including content, metadata, and related tool references.
frontend/src/utils/seoData.ts: Defines the SEOData interface and exports pre-configured SEO metadata objects (title, description, keywords, ogImage) for each static page including home, blog, about, contact, privacy, disclaimer, and terms.
frontend/src/utils/toolsData.ts: Defines the ToolData interface and exports arrays of image and PDF tool configurations, each containing id, name, description, route, category, keywords, related tools, FAQ entries, and meta SEO fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), an extended color palette using oklch CSS variables, custom border radii, box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 11) for a production-ready image and PDF tools website, documenting architectural notes, existing features, known issues, admin credentials policy, and AdSense integration requirements.
